R

Report - Class in domainmodel
The java bean class that handles the Report object attributes and getter/setter methods.
Report(int, String, Date, String) - Constructor for class domainmodel.Report
Constructor
Report() - Constructor for class domainmodel.Report
 
ReportBroker - Class in dataaccess
Broker class which communicates with JDBC and handles all the Report information management.
ReportService - Class in businesslogic
Report Service handles all the operations regarding the Report Object, including generating and retrieving.
ReportService() - Constructor for class businesslogic.ReportService
 
resetPassword(String, String, String) - Method in class businesslogic.UserService
Generates unique password reset link for user to receive when resetting their password.
ResetPasswordService - Class in businesslogic
This service class handles all the Password Resetting calls from the servlet over the broker classes.
ResetPasswordService() - Constructor for class businesslogic.ResetPasswordService
 
ResetPasswordServlet - Class in servlets
 
ResetPasswordServlet() - Constructor for class servlets.ResetPasswordServlet
 
restoreBackup(String) - Method in class businesslogic.BackupService
Restores backup from selected file specified in parameter
